layers.name: False Color Near Infrared
layers.description: Based on combination of bands B04 (NIR), B02 (Red), B01 (Green)

layers.name: False Color Ultra Red
layers.description: Based on combination of bands B03 (Ultra Red), B02 (Red), B01 (Green)

layers.name: NDVI
layers.description: Normalized difference vegetation index: (B04 - B02) / (B04 + B02)

layers.name: NDWI
layers.description: Normalized difference water index: (B01 - B04) / (B01 + B04)
